report-definition.name: Successful Framework Requests
report-definition.sql: select handler, request, day, month, year, sum(requests) from escidocaggdef1_request_stats group by handler, request, day, month, year;

report-definition.name: Successful Framework Requests by Month and Year
report-definition.sql: select * from escidocaggdef1_request_stats where month = {month} and year = {year};

report-definition.name: Item retrievals, all users
report-definition.sql: select month, year, sum(requests) as itemRequests from pubman_object_stats where (object_id = {object_id}) and handler = 'de.escidoc.core.om.service.ItemHandler' and request='retrieve' group by month, year;

report-definition.name: File downloads per Item, all users
report-definition.sql: select parent_object_id as itemId, sum(requests) as fileRequests from pubman_object_stats where (parent_object_id = {object_id}) and handler = 'de.escidoc.core.om.service.ItemHandler' and request ILIKE 'retrieveContent' group by parent_object_id;

report-definition.name: File downloads, all users
report-definition.sql: select month, year, sum(requests) as fileRequests from pubman_object_stats where (object_id = {object_id}) and handler = 'de.escidoc.core.om.service.ItemHandler' and request ILIKE 'retrieveContent' group by month, year;

report-definition.name: Item retrievals, anonymous users
report-definition.sql: select month, year, sum(requests) as itemRequests from pubman_object_stats where (object_id = {object_id}) and handler = 'de.escidoc.core.om.service.ItemHandler' and request='retrieve' and user_id='false' group by month, year;

report-definition.name: File downloads per Item, anonymous users
report-definition.sql: select parent_object_id as itemId, sum(requests) as fileRequests from pubman_object_stats where (parent_object_id = {object_id}) and handler = 'de.escidoc.core.om.service.ItemHandler' and request ILIKE 'retrieveContent' and user_id='false' group by parent_object_id;

report-definition.name: File downloads, anonymous users
report-definition.sql: select month, year, sum(requests) as fileRequests from pubman_object_stats where (object_id = {object_id}) and handler = 'de.escidoc.core.om.service.ItemHandler' and request ILIKE 'retrieveContent' and user_id='false' group by month, year;
